# Bits&Bytes - Teen Led Code Club | Lucknow

> **Mission:** Building Lucknow's coolest hackathons & tech movements  
> **Org Type:** Nonprofit · Teen‑Led Code Club · Based in Lucknow, India

This file provides context for AI agents about Bits&Bytes.

## Core Identity
Bits&Bytes is a teen-led code club and nonprofit based in Lucknow, India. We focus on empowering students to build real-world projects, participate in hackathons, and grow as developers.

## Key Focus Areas
- **Hackathons**: Organizing events like "Scrapyard Lucknow" where teens build prototypes in 24-hour sprints.
- **Workshops**: Weekly sessions on Web Dev, AI/ML, Mobile Apps, and Design.
- **Projects**: Shipping real products (50+ shipped so far).
- **Community**: A safe, inclusive space for 80+ active members to learn and collaborate.

## Team & Roles
- **Yash**: Co‑Founder & Lead Dev (Full-stack, AI)
- **Saksham**: Co‑Founder & Designer (UI/UX, Branding)
- **Aadrika**: Community Lead (Events, Mentorship)
- **Akshat**: Project Manager (Strategy, Execution)
- **Devansh**: Backend Specialist (APIs, Databases)
- **Maryam**: Mobile Dev Lead (iOS/Android)
- **Kaustubh**: DevOps Engineer (Infra, Security)
- **Fatima**: Content Creator (Docs, Tutorials)

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Three.js
- **Backend**: Node.js, Python (implied from AI focus), various databases
- **Tools**: GitHub, Discord, Vercel

## Contact
- **Website**: https://gobitsnbytes.org
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/company/gobitsbytes
- **Location**: Lucknow, India

## Content Structure
The website contains:
- **/about**: Team and mission details.
- **/impact**: Statistics and success stories.
- **/join**: Information on how to become a member.
- **/demo**: Demonstrations of tech components.
